citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the Institutional Animal Care & Use Committee paperwork was not available for review and
examination by APHIS officials. The facility was asked to provide the paperwork but was unable to do so in a timely
manner.
Review of IACUC paperwork and other documents ensures that the IACUC is functioning as intended. Required records,
as outlined in the Animal Welfare Act and regulations, must be available for an APHIS official to review at the time of
inspection. The registrant must establish a system that ensures records are available upon inspection.
To be corrected by April 19, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.38(b)(1)(ii) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
At the time of inspection, the Institutional Animal Care & Use Committee paperwork was not available for review and 
examination by APHIS officials. The facility was asked to provide the paperwork but was unable to do so in a timely 
manner.  
Review of IACUC paperwork and other documents ensures that the IACUC is functioning as intended. Required records, 
as outlined in the Animal Welfare Act and regulations, must be available for an APHIS official to review at the time of 
inspection. The registrant must establish a system that ensures records are available upon inspection. 
To be corrected by April 19, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
